# Install `plotmics`

```{r eval=FALSE}
# install devtools if not installed
if(!require(devtools)){ install.packages("devtools") }

# install plotmics if not installed
if(!require(plotmics)){ devtools::install_github("amitjavilaventura/plotmics") }
```

```{r results=FALSE}
# load plotmics
library(plotmics)
```
